name: Raymond HOSSBACK v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Hossback v. Commonwealth, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: Raymond HOSSBACK v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Arthur R. Thomas, Asst. Chief Counsel, Pa. Bd. of Probation and Parole, Robert A. Greeny, Harrisburg, for appellant.
John W. Packel, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
446 A.2d 599
Raymond HOSSBACK v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 19, 1982.
Decided June 17, 1982.
Arthur R. Thomas, Asst. Chief Counsel, Pa. Bd. of Probation and Parole, Robert A. Greeny, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Raymond Hossback, pro se.
John W. Packel, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
